title: How to respond to an apology for being stood up - Quora

response.answer_text: Sounds like it is the first time that it happened. So all you need to say is okay. There are not a lot of details in your questions, but it is not really that complicated. How you feel inside is another question and there is a myriad of situations and emotions one could feel. It depends on your personal make up. How sensitive are you to others acts? Really, there is no reason not to notify another person with the fact that most people have cell phones. If I really think I want to see this person again, I would arrange a meeting place super close to my home. Ask them to call me when they arrive. Then go.

Take the apology at face value. It is what it is. You don't have to ever speak to that person again or you can choose to believe what they say and tell them that you understand. Emergencies happen sometimes. We can always try another time. Get lost! Say like I do. Just say. ” O.” And leave it at that.
